works.description: With luxury air travel getting better every day, the luxury airlines are vying with each other to provide the best in-flight entertainment and luxury suites aimed at affluent business travelers. Besides the finest luxuries offered aboard, what sets them apart is the comfort and convenience to customize the experience at one go. We have earlier told you about Georgia-based Flight Display Systems “Cabin Management System.” The latest luxury aircraft to boast this high-end installation is American Eurocopter’s first Eurocopter EC 145. VIP passengers can now control XM Radio, Blu-ray video, cabin lighting,
